Plot: The year is 1072. The Normans have captured England. The Turks have captured a Norman knight. And in order to free him, a soldier named Vallon must capture four rare hawks. On a heart-stopping journey to the far ends of the earth, braving Arctic seas, Viking warlords, and the blood-drenched battlefields, Vallon and his comrades must track down their quarry one by one in a relentless race against time. The scale is huge. The journey is incredible. The history is real. This is Hawk Quest.
Characters: Vallon the Frank, Hero the Greek, Raul the German, Wayland the Englishman, Richard the Norman, Drogo the Norman, Snorri the Norwegian, Syth
